'''''Mallorn'' 28''' is the twenty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in September [[1991]].
==Contents==
* Cover Illustration
** By: [[Pauline Baynes]]
* Celtic Influences on the History of the First Age
** By: Marie Barnfieid
* Frithuwold and the Farmer: ''Farmer Giles of Ham'' and his place in History
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds]]
* The Quest for Imladris
** By: Madawc Williams
* Sordid Suburbia
** By: [[Alex Lewis]]
* ''The Hobbit'' and ''A Midsummer Night's Dream''
** By: Lisa Hopkins
* Sublime Scenes and Horrid Novels: Milestones along the Road to Middle-earth
** By: [[John Ellison]]
* Valaquanta: Of the Energy of the Valar
** By: Jennifer Coombs and Marc Read
* How to learn Elvish
** By: [[Nancy Martsch]]
* Review: ''[[The War of the Ring]]''
** By: [[Charles Noad]]
* Review: ''[[C.S. Lewis: A Biography (1990 book)|C.S. Lewis: a Biography]]'', by A.N. Wilson
** By: [[Wayne G. Hammond|Wayne Hammond]]
* Research Report: Oxonmoot Eccentricity Survey
** By: Sarah Sturch

* Inside Art
** By: Denis Gordeyev, [[John Ellison]], Ian Collier, Ellen Chapman, Alexander Nikolayev, [[Ruth Lacon]], Steve Lines
